sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the first of two days of oral hearings, lawyers for South Africa described an excessive death toll of over 23,200 civilians, 70% of whom are women and children, with over 7,000 people dead or trapped under the rubble.

sentences.sentence: They also described the risk of famine and starvation among the Gaza population, where the court heard people cannot access food or life-saving medical supplies due to the ongoing bombing and refusal by Israel to allow enough fuel, water or food into the enclave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
